twitch_info.title: Highlight: 217+ Hours of Enhanced Interrogation Techniques

message.body: ay.  if you get a weird link from Jr for a game do not download it
discord hack
What is up?
is this the real jr
hello
I will not download weird stuff
don't worry
U send me ur as num
I want ss num giv u cash from princ
a nigerian prince?
I must be so lucky
not my most shining moment
you got scammed?
Send me the 100$ bitcoin
they hijacked mine but I got it back, jr was not as lucky
wait, both of you got hacked?
it was a slippery slope of fuckery
jeez, thanks for warning me
my shit got taken and they used my account to send jr a link and got him too
so how did you get it back?
changed my password
you're lucky they didn't do that first right?
yeah, they did to Jr it seems
The download link “he” sent me instantly changed my e-mail, password. And deleted 2-factor authentication.
Had no chance to do anything.
so did you get it back?
Discord told me to click on the forgotten password link.
did it do anything?
Lol, of course not.
oh fuck because they changed the email
fuck.
Yep.
so what are you going to do now?
I am still waiting for a response.
I wish there was a way I could warn Dave’s Lemonade and Ondiavari servers.
onda-what now?
"Dave! dont download superfurry!"
It’s an Australian guy.
"oi m8!  dont download that"
Actually, so is Dave.
pprrrrrrroooovvvvveeeeerrrrrbbbbiiiiiaaaallll
It has been almost seven hours without a response from Discord.
the proverbial creeeam of the crop
time to send a new ticket in
THE CREAM.  RRRRRRRRIIIIIIIIIISE TO THE TOP
I can still e-mail the existing one.  I sent screenshots of my conversation with the bhenchod.
lmfao goddamnit
sorry, the volume was a little low
just realised
we need to here him much more clearly as he talks about rome
hear*
I can’t hear it because it is always buffering.
algo, ask him what a bhenchod is is
I just hear an old dude talking about religion
sadly it's prerecorded
and no comment section in youtube for this one
It’s a term of endearment used by the Indians.  Call an Indian guy and his group of large friends bhenchod if you want to be accepted by them.
I bet it means "used whore" or something
It means “one who fucks his sister.”
close
@AcidicIV this is what you're paying for if you go to yale Keepo
WE LIVE.  IN A SOCIETT
I sent a Patreon message to Dave hours ago.  I hope he checks those.
lmfao
shouldn't have stumbled
bitch.
just like this game. make one wrong move: you die
but God loves you
it's tough love
Salty bitch.
this dude paid close attention to how to stretch a 3 page paper to 12
he's a history professor, he must have had a lot of practice
history professor shouldn't exist
give the people books
read child. read
there's a book I read about that
the teacher was teaching the students a language he did not speak (flemish I think), and he gave the a dual french-flemish translation of Telemachus to them and just had them learn that way
biology professor makes sense.  math professor makes sense.  history professor does not
I consider it storytime
the problem is there really is no history professor, just a philosopher with a history book
philosphers are even worse than this
yeah, that textbook author totally could've commanded that army better
my point is that a history professor is one who presents their interpretation of history
yeah
I feel like it should be hard dates and maps
like heres a bucket of facts, have fun
vs heres how I feel about this historical event
I think the professor is demonstrating "how" one might interpret history, your job as a student of history is to make interpretations like he does, but not necessarily the same ones
but certainly the students need a bucket of facts for that
My zelda experience with fire arrows disagrees with what he said
I think I will load up a 0.9x speed executable
hello algosith!!
hello xoryla!
being consistent at such random attacks is so hard, but it's what I'm working on right now
i see you really enjoy playing on 0.7 speed
I was playing on 0.8 yesterday
this is 0.9
in the past I did play on 0.7
huh
so that means soon youll manage to practice with an original speed
yes, maybe in the next few weeks
but there is an issue
the faster you go, the more time it takes to acclimate
I also have some higher speed exe
like 1.1 and 1.2
oh  thats what i wanted to say
you get used to lower speeds
and immediate changing it is a hard thing
also, even at the lower speed, we can see that I am not very consistent. this will only get worse at higher speeds
i think you can't have an ideal consistency on this avoidance
I agree
we all know it is one of the most luck based avoidances
in the history
but I was looking at some deadsplits the other day, and I saw that you had hundreds of attempts to shower before you beat it
bloggerop had more than 1000
yesterday I played for an hour and got 1
clearly my consistency is not good enough
that's the consistency i wanted to develop all this time
and i finally got something
from the shower
but it's still not as good as yours
because i beat shower only 13 (?) times
that's a total amount
13? let me go back and check your deadsplit
i was judging by deaths on falling bursts
deadsplit says 45 deaths to shower at 25% consistency, which implies 100 attempts got there
yeah, so you have 12 deaths on falling bursts, which means you got 60 runs there
so you're saying my consistency on falling bursts will help, if I am understanding you correctly?
you know i hadn't played the game without deadsplit, so the number of my falling bursts attempts is the number of the shower clears
not number
amount
that's the word
either number or amount is correct here
wait wait wait I don't know how 12 deaths on bursts + 2 deaths on "here we go again" attack means i passed shower 60 times
how does this work
haha
yes, I think there is a mistake in that logic
your ds practice mode is so good
too many warps for an each attack
oh, so you must have had 12 / (1 - 20%) = 15 attempts to bursts
is that correct?
im comparing it with the original practice mode and that's so much difference
yep i think so
yes, this practice tool is so much more useful
I even have a warp specifically for walk or die
that's so useful!!!
ok, with my new understanding of deadsplit, let me check how many attempts bloggerop got to shower
so you were judging by consistency percentage there?
yes
the formula for number of attempts is deaths / (1 - success rate)
so for blogger, he got 1250 attempts to shower before he cleared
i didn't attach any importance to these percentage stats
why use deadsplit then?
i was using it for seeing attack streaks
it was interesting for me
where can you see that?
that x2/x3 thing
oh, so that's what that means, I didn't know
that's a muber how many times you passed the atrack in the row
number*
that seems like a fun feature
yeah that's the main reason why i started using deadsplit for ds
an incorrect deadsplit time on my clear video means i started using it after start of actual grinding avoidance
by 33 hours
what was your pb when you started using it?
i haven't gotten to the falling bursts once
i got to shower attack
isn't that incredible progress in the last 30 hours?
that was my pb for tgat moment
well, I supposed you did first try most of the rest
yeah, true grind time started when i finally got used to walk or die
and started not dying there all the time
i have a video of my pb for july 2021
on youtube?
that was my first shower attempt
yeah, it's unlisted, i can give a link
thanks
you can watch thus funny thing
this
https://youtu.be/PNrjpWgEhAE
check out how i was doing walk or die
sorry for that audio
walk or die was literally an impossible attack for me
and my dodges were too unconfident
that was rally good rng
this made me pass to the shower once
without even properly doibg walk or die
doing
you did something similar to what max does
it works
hahahah
I can do it too
but you don't always have space for it
fulljumps and panicked left and right mashing?
aahhhh i got it
yeah, the part before was definitely not a max strat LUL
avoiding arrows from the top by going to the left
not the corner strat
yes, that
that's a harder strat imo
I think it makes the walking part easier, but you have to position further right, which is sometimes more dangerous
when you stand further from these bullets it is way easier to dodge
but there's no much space
yes, that's why I do your strat and not maxes
when you're stuck in the corner
I think if you happen to be standing outside of the corner, then doing max's strat to get back into it is good
but you need to dodge things in more dangerous way!
yes, it's only something I would do if I were forced into that position by the previous part of the attack
yesterday i got my 4th attempt on outro in ao stage
outro is the brown arrow attack onward right?
and there's no progress
outro is the last attacks of the avoidance, it is similar to first ones
ok, that's what I meant
where in the outro did you die?
the first attack?
like on other 3 attempts, the veeery first attack
im so bad lol
my read skills just immediately disappear when im getting to outro
because of nervousness?
im too nervous to do even a single move
yesterday, I was very nervous the whole time I was playing
my hands were shaking
I'm just not too used to doing attempts
btw when you got to the shower on original game, did you feel nervous there already?
yes, since I was nervous the entire time I was playing LUL
oh you answered to my question before i asked
LUL
yeah, the nervousness did not increase, it was a constant factor
I died because I can't read that attack well enough
with time, the nervousness on the shower will disappear
especially when you have that much consistency
yes, once I die to it so much I get sick of it LUL
that's how I beat fish, I died to final so much that I was not nervous anymore, just impatient
oh  i tried i wanna be the fish  today!
what did you think
i thought it is a weird avoidance  with a weird song
until i played it
...now i am addicted to fish music
I definitely approve of the music in that game
I personally  like it more than the music in this one
wow
but I cannot decide whether I like fish itself more or not
the avoidance is good in general
(i still haven't cleared it playing for 2 hrs)
it's very hard
but theres a luckbased attack near the end
It's not on the HoF, but don't underestimate it
and that's kinda not a good decision to put this corners attack
corners and final are luck yeah
when you have to read bullets from 2 top corners
at once
reading two corners is something you can get used to, but the speed up at the end is different
from ~15 corners attack attempts
i passed it only once
everything else is just dying to last seconds there
when bullets are going at insanely high speed
it speeds up so much I feel it's unreactable sometimes
and you still have to read from 2 corners!!
this kinda killed my enjoyment while playing it
I just try not to move around too much and hope everything misses me at that point
but the consistency to corners exists
fortunately
pulsing bullets is an interesting one
the slow part of it is fine
the sped up part is not
that's how I feel
wait, which attack do you mean
I could see a lot of attacks in this avoidance described like that
yeah but i could somehow read either of that
haha u died lorema2SMOREc
yeah yeah thats the attack you meant
hi nojah, welcome
so bad
literally JR
@xoryla there are two attacks that pulse with speedups
is this still about the Roman Empire?
yes nojah, he's talking about the romans
I fail on a much higher level than jr Kappa
@xoryla the first one, with the orbs that shrink and expand, I think is completely fair
and the second one is that goes with high speed?
but the part at the end, which  you haven't gotten to, where the bullets move at you horizontally, after the speedup, I think is not
I will link a timestamp
https://youtu.be/ioTzOw_P9sA?t=99
lets see
so i see this is another luck dependent attack
but with infinite jump at least
yes, without infinite jump it would be really bullshit
even more than it already is
oh, i see you have hostage relationship with this attack LUL
with which one?
wait
hostile relationship
hostage that's the other word
yes, hostile means you don't like it
when English is harder than fish  moment
yes, it's 99 difficulty
I am lucky enough to have grown up speaking it
that is the only advantage I have over japanese superplayers
yeah, it's sad when I couldn't understand bloggerop for example
during his ds clear
ds grind*
always wanted to understand what does he say about the avoidance
I watched some of him, but I do not remember, does he speak in english or korean on those streams?
only korean
yeah, it's a shame we don't know korean
i guess he knows English well but only in a written form
in writing
it seems like reading it is easy than speaking
it's the same for me with German
i don't know, i didn't even think to learn eastern languages
like japanese or korean
so i don't know about that
I think english is more important anyway. people speak english around the world, even some of these eastern people, but korean and japanese are only spoken in korea and japan
that's an objective opinion
you mean subjective I think
objective means fact, subjective means opinion
i mean everyone would agree with this statement
oh, my bad
in that case you are right
but sometimes you really regret you don't know jap
when it's about anime watching for example
or
when you want to visit japan
it would be difficult to live there without knowing
the language
yeah, I would get a lot of use out of japanese for online stuff, like reading japanese fangamer's blog's and video descriptions
yeah, i still can't understand what blue says in his videos description
and I can't even copy text from mobile youtube
if you're interested in visiting japan, there is a blog I read written by an american expat who lives there which you might be interested in
so I can't use translator
https://japaneseruleof7.com/
mobile youtube is just really bad
yeah japan is one of countries i want to visit in the future
ill check out

it is what it is
but his descriptions of his games on his nico blog were interesting to read
like, he said DS is his favorite avoidances, and that charisma breaker is boring
so there is destruction state description as well??
yes, I will paste it here
so cool
but then i still don't know why does blue delete his avoidances download link in delfruit
